silver: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.
Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.
Units isolated in pairs gain 12% Attack Speed and 12 Armor at the start of combat.
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.
Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls. Gain 3 gold.
Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds (including this round).
After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.
Gain 9 free Shop rerolls that never expire.
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.
Your champions holding an item gain 200 health.
Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.
Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 15% Attack Speed and Move Speed.
If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.
Champions that aren't holding items have a 35% to drop 1 gold on death.

Your team has 10% Omnivamp and convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 225.
After 8 player combats. choose 1 of 4 Support items.
Gain a Component Anvil and 4 Gold.
Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 175 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.
When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.
Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.
Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.
Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.
Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.
Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.
Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 33 Gold.
Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.
After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) equipped with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).
Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.
Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.
Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.
Gain 1 random component and 2 random 3-cost champions.
Increase your current and maximum player health by 30.
Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.
You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 Gold.
Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support items.
For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slots. After, get 3 item components.
Open a special shop with three free 3-cost champions. You can only pick one, but you get 2 copies of it.
Open a special shop with three free 4-cost champions. You can only pick one, but you get 2 copies of it.
Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.
After 4 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.
gold: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.
At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 7 Gold.
At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 9 gold.
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.
Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.
Your team gains 100 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.
Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds (including this round).
Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two random Artifacts each round.
If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 XP.
Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.
Your team gains a 90-170 Shield for 4 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.
After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.
Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1.25 seconds.
Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 100% stronger.
Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.
Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.
Your units gain 2.5% Attack Damage and 2.5 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.
Gain a Training Dummy. You gain 3 gold every time it survives player combat.
If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.
Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects, regardless of position.
Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.

Your team gains 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Each time an ally dies, gain these stats again.

Your team has 15% Omnivamp and convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 450.
Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1% of their max Health.
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 6 gold.
Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding this item deal 12% increased damage.
When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.
Your team gains 15% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.
Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 260 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.
Your team deals 10% more damage. Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.
After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.
Your team gains 18 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.
Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 9% Attack Speed for each 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.
Combat start: Your 2 units furthest form each other form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.
Your max interest is capped at 4 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.
Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their amx Health.
Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.
Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 2 random component items.
Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.
Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.
Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Stikk Shivs' chain lightning effect deals 40~125% more damage (based on stage level).
Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.
The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.
Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).
Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.
Your team gains 66 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.
Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.
Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.
Your units with no Traits active gain 240-530 Health and 45-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).
Your team gains 90 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.
Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.
Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.
Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.
Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.
Gain an Altruist Emblem and a Riven.
Gain an Arcanist Emblem and a Lux.

Gain a Bruiser Emblem and an Aatrox.
Every 2 takedowns, Storyweaver Kayle permanently gains 3 Ability Power and 18 Health. Gain a Garen and a Sivir.
At the start of every stage, including this one, gain 4 free rerolls + 1 for each of your Heavenly champions. Gain a Kha'Zix and a Malphite.
Gain a Dragon's Claw. Every time you heal 7000 Health with Dragon's Claws, gain an item component, up to 4.
Gain a Dragonlord Emblem, a Janna, and a Diana.
Gain a Neeko. Your strongest Neeko's spell Heals 35% more, and slams for 35% increased damage. Each cast increases the spell radius by 1.
Gain a Dryad Emblem and a Gnar.
Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Qiyana.
Get a random 5-cost champion and a random champion that shares a trait with them. Get 20 gold.
Your Duelists start combat with 2 stacks. At max stacks, they gain 10% Omnivamp. Gain a Darius and a Yasuo.
After the dragon strikes, Dragonlords deal 20% bonus true damage. Gain a Janna.
Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 6 XP and 2 free rerolls for that round only.
Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls for that round only.
Gain a Shen. Your Strongest Shen gains +3 Range and his spell does 85% increased damage.
Gain a Fated Emblem and a Kindred.
Gain a Fortune Emblem and a Teemo.
Gain a Ghostly Emblem and an Shen.
Your Reapers gain 8% Critical Strike chance and 5% Omnivamp. They gain this bonus again every time they get a takedown. Gain a Kindred and Yone.

Gain a Heavenly Emblem and a Neeko.
Gain an Inkshadow Emblem and a Senna.
Gain an Invoker Emblem and a Janna.
Every time a unique Mythic champion becomes Epic, gain 2 player health and 3 gold. Gain a Cho'Gath and Kog'Maw.
Snipers gain 15% Attack Speed. Gain a Caitlyn and a Kog'Maw. After Snipers have attacked a total distance of 1200 hexes, gain a Sniper's Focus.
Gain a 2-star Kobuko. Your strongest Kobuko's Ability deals 225% damage. If Kobuko kills an enemy, they have a 100% chance to drop 1 gold.
Trickshots bounce 1 additional time for 40% of original damage. Gain a Sivir and Teemo.
Whenever an Invoker casts, grant the lowest Health ally Shield equal to 200% of Mana spent. Gain a Janna.
Gain a Yorick. Your Strongest Yorick gains 25% max Health and additionally deals 20% of his max Health with his ability.
Every round, gain 2 Dryad stacks. If a Dryad deals 8% additional damage. Gain a Rek'Sai and a Gnar.

Gain a Porcelain Emblem and a Lux.
Gain 1 item component(s). Every 3 wins gives you an item component.
Combat start: Your strongest Behemoth gains 20% Health. When other Behomoths die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Cho'Gath and a Malphite.
Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.
Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.
Gain a Sage Emblem, a Zyra, and a Diana.
Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.
Gain 1 Component Anvil. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.
Gain 1 Component Anvil and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.
Gain a Sniper Emblem and a Senna.

Gain a 2-star Garen. Your strongest Garen's Ability now grants stacking max Health instead of Shield. If he has more max Health than his target, his Ability deals 45% bonus true damage.
Gain a Storyweaver Emblem and a Garen.
Gain 1 XP. Each unique Sage that starts combat in the middle 2 rows grants 1 XP. Gain a Zyra.
Your rerolls cost 0 gold. Every 6 rerolls, the cost goes up by 1 gold. At the start of each stage your reroll cost is reset to 0.
Gain an Umbral Emblem and a Yorick.

Gain 2 Exalted Champions. Your Exalted Soul Core gains gold instead of XP. If you lose combat, it gets 3 bonus gold.

If there no 1 or 2-cost Exalted champions, get one 3-cost instead.

Bruisers heal 2% of their max Health every 1 second. Gain a Kobuko and a Rek'Sai.

prismatic: Caretaker's Chosen

As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component Anvil
Level 6: Completed Item Anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items.
Birthday Present
Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).
Blinding Speed
Gain a Red Buff, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve bow and a Magnetic Remover.
Buried Treasures III
Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).
Final Ascension
Your team deals 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.
Cybernetic Bulk III
Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.
Cybernetic Uplink III
Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.
Prismatic Ticket
Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.
Going Long
You no longer gain interest. Gain 10 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.
Jeweled Lotus III
Your team gains 40% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.
Harmacist III
Your team has 25% Omnivamp and converts 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.
Hedge Fund
Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.
Hedge Fund+
Gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.
Hedge Fund++
Gain 40 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.
Shopping Spree
Gain 4 gold. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.
Impenetrable Bulwark
Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.
Living Forge
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 8 player combats.
Lucky Gloves
Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.
Lucky Gloves+
Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.
Level Up!
When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.
New Recruit
Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.
Overwhelming Force
Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.
Pandora's Items III

Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.
Phreaky Friday
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.
Phreaky Friday+
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.
Pumping Up III
Your team gains 10% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.
Radiant Relics
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.
Roll The Dice
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.
March of Progress
Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.
Starter Kit

Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.
Stationary Support III
Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).
The Golden Egg
Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.
Tiniest Titan
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
Tiniest Titan+

Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.
Unleashed Arcana
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.
Accomplice
Get a Support Thief's Gloves and 2 gold.
Altruist Crown
Gain an Altruist Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Riven.
Arcanist Crown
Gain an Arcanist Emblem, a Statikk Shiv, and a Lux.
At What Cost
Immediately go to level 6. You don't get to choose your future augments. Gain 1 gold.
Ba-BOOM!
Your champions deal 90% more damage for 2 seconds on every other cast.
Behemoth Crown
Gain a Behemoth Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, a Yorick, and a Thresh.
Bruiser Crown
Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and an Aatrox.
Build a Bud!
Gain a random three star 1-cost unit and 8 gold.
Call to Chaos

Gain a powerful and random reward.
(Randomly gain one of the following:)
[58 gold], [64 experience], [40 rerolls that do not expire], [Training dummy with 2x Zeke's Herald], [Training dummy with 2x Locket of the Iron Solari], [3x Hullcrushers and an item remover], [3x Snipers focus and an item remover], [Random 3-star 3-cost unit and 20 gold], [3x Thief's Gloves and an item remover], [5 random emblems(no duplicates) and an item remover]
Dragonlord Crown
Gain a Dragonlord Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Janna, and a Diana.
Dryad Crown
Gain a Dryad Emblem, a Titans Resolve, and a Gnar.
Duelist Crown
Gain a Duelist Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Qiyana.

Gain a Fated Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Kindred.
Fortune Crown
Gain a Fortune Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Teemo.
Ghostly Crown
Gain a Ghostly Emblem, a Bramble Vest, and a Shen.
Heavenly Crown
Gain a Heavenly Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Neeko.
Inkshadow Crown
Gain an Inkshadow Emblem, an Evenshroud, and a Senna.
Invoker Crown
Gain an Invoker Emblem, a Rabadon's Deathcap, and a Janna.
Mythic Crown
Gain a Mythic Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Neeko.
Porcelain Crown
Gain a Porcelain Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Amumu.
Radiant Refactor

Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvils.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!
Reaper Crown
Gain a Reaper Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Kindred.
Sage Crown
Gain a Sage Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, a Zyra, and a Diana.
Sniper Crown
Gain a Sniper Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Senna.
Storyweaver Crown
Gain a Storyweaver Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and a Riven.
Tiny, but Deadly
Your units are 50% smaller, but move and attack 30% faster.
Two for One
Each round, get a copy of the first champion you buy that costs 3 or less.
Umbral Crown
Gain an Umbral Emblem, a Redemption, and a Yorick.
Warden Crown
Gain a Warden Emblem, a Redemption and a Gnar.
Wandering Trainer II
Gain 6 gold and a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems.
